extendedInfo.description: The fastest and most awesome way to find streaming **movies and tv shows** to rent or buy, across most major services. Never waste time checking each individual service again! "It's like Kayak for streaming services." - Roberto Baldwin, Gizmodo.com 11/01/2011 CanIStream.it currently searches iTunes, Hulu, Netflix, Amazon Instant Video, VUDU, Crackle, EPIX, Streampix, Redbox, and XFinity premium channels; we are continually adding new services to the list, so remember to check back often. If the movie you are looking for is not available, you can: -Set up reminders, or -Push notifications Simply select the movie and the service, and the moment it becomes available for your chosen method of viewing, we will inform you. And the best part â itâs FREE!Services currently searched:- Netflix (Instant and DVD)- Amazon (Prime Instant, Rental, Purchase, DVD, Bluray)- Hulu (including Plus)- YouTube (free / rental)- EPIX- Streampix- Vudu (rental / purchase)- Blockbuster (rental / purchase)- Android (rental)- Redbox (DVD rentals)- XFinity (HBO, Showtime, Encore, Starz, etc)Visit us on the web at CanIStream.It

reviews.title: Could be way better
reviews.comment: Would be great if included MaxGo, EpixGo, and other on demand results like Starz and Showtime. Lots of discrepancies though. (i.e. I\'m watching AVP on HboGo yet according to the app it\'s not available...)
reviews.author: Joseph Spacone

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: So convenient.. I don\'t have to search thru all the different movie sites to find a movie, this one does it for you.. I recommend this app!
reviews.author: Sabrina Plessala

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Really useful app. As someone who cut his cable and streams everything now, this is a vital everyday app. Wish it was a tad quicker, and could easily open apps like netflix, amazon instant etc to the shows I just searched.
reviews.author: Michael Quiroz

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I was tired of checking 4 different services to see if a movie I wanted to stream was on one. Now just go here and I know! Love also how if it\'s not you can set up to get notified when streaming on your chosen service starts!
reviews.author: Josh Maxwell

reviews.title: Prefer the website
reviews.comment: Their website is just as good, plus a bookmark uses a lot less space on my phone. One thing I don\'t like about the site or the app is that they make you choose if you want to search TV vs movies. Why not just search both?
reviews.author: Alexander Benenson

reviews.title: Could not find Atlas Shrugged.
reviews.comment: I just watched part II on Google  Play! Said n/a. Bad software. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Chloe S.

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Force closes constantly, when not closing i try to select the notify, asks me to sign in when i already am, them says not the correct email.... Crap!
reviews.author: Kris Nelson

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work anymore
reviews.comment: Used to at least be able to search correctly. Now every episode of all my series always airs in the month of Jan. So it can\'t confirm any streaming, which is the whole point of the app!
reviews.author: Rich Osborn

reviews.title: As expected
reviews.comment: Made searches easier. However, somewhat inaccurate, wish it had redbox instant, and could use better techniques to the actual application, but I love the idea, I use it often
reviews.author: Lea Dunn

reviews.title: Does Not Work
reviews.comment: I tried two different searches and it just sits there spinning on the loading screen.
reviews.author: Tommy Phillips

reviews.title: Almost Brilliant...
reviews.comment: The concept is brilliant. Sadly, the execution/performance is less than brilliant. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Mike Reiter

reviews.title: Slow but indispensable
reviews.comment: Sometimes the app feels a little lethargic when searching, but compare that to firing up Netflix, then iTunes, then Amazon, etc. to see if a movie is available to stream. One of my favorite apps. Highly recommended if you like to stream movies.
reviews.author: Dean Lusk

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: I use vudu, crackle, Netflix, Google play movies, & Amazon. Got frustrated when I bought a movie only to find out it was free somewhere else. This app solves that problem, and allows you to compare the best deal for what you want to watch. Perfect tool for cable cutters like me. Great job devs! Thanks
reviews.author: Sean Corcoran

reviews.title: Con
reviews.comment: One bad thing is that u have to buy the episode if u didn\'t have to buy it, it would b perfect but because it costs money I can\'t use this app
reviews.author: Vicki Lynn

reviews.title: Can I stream it
reviews.comment: Very easy to use, type any movie title in and it finds it.  Works for TV shows too.
reviews.author: Anita Rinta

reviews.title: All movies n/a status
reviews.comment: I installed and uninstalled this crap right away. I browsed movies from \'80s to \'00s but everything i searched turned unavailable though not all, some sites are available but you have to pay for it when u watch it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: I use to find out were I can buy new releases. I just need Google play movies on my Roku.
reviews.author: Carvis Cathey

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: I wish I invented this service. App does the job just fine.
reviews.author: Daniel Coe

reviews.title: Wrong info
reviews.comment: Used to be my go to app but in the last few months the info is usually wrong.  It\'s become useless which is sad because it was very helpful.
reviews.author: sandy pardes

reviews.title: Works as advertised
reviews.comment: Simple concept and it just does it right. Nice design and doesn\'t crash. Update: still great, still never crashes
reviews.author: A Google User
